meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>conspir</kanji>ing I'm doing? <kanji>Nothing</kanji>... that's how much. If I don't conspire, I don't think about my actions. If I don't think, then I am just being <vocabulary>reckless</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>thoughtless</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
